class_notes: (THIS COURSE IS FULL; email candlerregistrar@emory.edu to be placed on the waiting list) (ONLINE: synchronous live sessions Friday 11:00am-12:00pm)
course_description:
This professional formation course introduces students to concepts of self-advocacy & narrative. As professionals, ministers, & leaders in a suffering world, we will ask what is it to be upright as a child of God & to claim, honor, & communicate our gifts to the world?
Students will learn the importance of & practice (1) identifying professional strengths, interests, & values, (2) taking self-ownership over their vocational futures, including purposefully guiding their time at Candler, & (3) articulating their unique professional strengths, value, & vision to employers & the world.
